scene_description_enriched: A single figure, identified as Saint Lawrence, stands in a frontal pose. He wears a blue tunic over a white garment and holds a red book in his left hand and a gridiron, his attribute, in his right. He has a halo, indicating sainthood. The background is a rich red tapestry with gold scrolling patterns. The floor is tiled with a green and white geometric pattern. The scene is framed by a gold border.
